data.message:
Hi. I think to myself. I can still try! Scripted letters was in Detroit, showed him what i think. What else can i do?! Should i continue to love him and still gets nothing. Just take another!? My heart hurts. Then'll stay, shit, alone and look further whether someone is fighting for me.... 
I'm 30 and i knowing what i like..... peace.... kiss

replies.message: I'm sad,  that this has no value for you. You had crossed my line... i was not sad about it but now i'm. Bye bye bye...
